text: Neil Christopher Sanderson (born December 17, 1978) is a Canadian musician. He is the current drummer of the Canadian rock band Three Days Grace and the original drummer of the Canadian Christian rock band Thousand Foot Krutch from 1996 to 1997. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian Christians Category:Canadian drummers Category:Canadian rock musicians Category:Heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Peterborough, Ontario Category:Rock drummers
title: Neil Sanderson
